resources.string: Q1)If the interest on N150.00 for 2.5years is N4.5,find the interest on N250.00 for 6months at the same rate.
Q2)The cost of renovating a 6m square room is N540.What is the cost of renovating a 9m square room
Q3)A car dealer bought a second-hand car for N250,000 and spent N70,000 refurbishing it.He then sold the car for N400,000.What is the percentage gain

Q4)Three boys shared some oranges.The first received 1/3 of the oranges and the second received 2/3 of the remainder .If the third boy received the remaining 12 oranges, how many oranges did they share
Q5)Which ofthe following groups fall into the Civil Service:
Q6)The most senior class of the Nigerian Civil Service is:
Q7)The recruitment of appointment of the permanent secretary is one of the duties of :

string.name: extra
string.i: choose the word that best complete each of the following sentences from Q8-Q10

resources.string: Q8)Please,let me .........you in your car to the railway stations
Q10)The activities marking the golden jubilee celebration were.........with a party
